PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05202024-05-16GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Permit Authorization Order
PrecisSPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (EXTREMIST SETTLER VIOLENCE) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0092 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (EXTREMIST SETTLER VIOLENCE) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
